Welcome to bikeRontheroad.com
 

 

Thank you for visiting my web page.  My objective here is to depict my discoveries exploring our world on my bicycle.  My purpose is to show you what a great thrill and a real honor it is to be able to explore so many different  places, cultures and people in a really exciting collection of now more than 50 countries over the last 15 years.
 
In 1998, I began representing the  Le CARE-Caritas center in Geneva, Switzerland.  My mission was cycling as their rolling ambassador to promote their award winning social  services activities center in Geneva.  Our original fundraising idea, "KILOMETERS FOR CARE,"  enabled my cycling to represent them on long distance pedal pilgrimages to Santiago de Compostela, Rome and even a failed attempt at Jerusalem. 

Then in 1999, in a second attempt at reaching Jerusalem, my cycling program grew two-fold to include presenting a civic "Message of Peace" on behalf of the mayor and administrative council of the city of Geneva, Switzerland to the mayor and municipal authorities in Jerusalem.  At the same time, I was also delegated by the Doyen of the Geneva St Pierre Cathedral and his fellow signatory committee of international notables to deliver their "Geneva Spiritual Appeal" to civic authorities, business leaders and global decision makers encountered there.  I was successful with my initiative in Jerusalem and from there began my professional cycling career with a peaceful and spiritual challenge.
 
In the 2007 celebration of the 30th anniversary of the Le CARE-Caritas center in Geneva I cycled  on a 3 month "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" fundraising tour of Switzerland and Liechtenstein and sold 700 kilometers  Now, back from a 6 month and 11,700 kilometer Geneva-Nordkapp-Geneva tour and with a total of 100,000 kilometers pedalled and for sale, we could contribute 1,0000,00  to Le CARE-Caritas with your active participation in this internet fundraising effort.  That would be amazing, giving away a million while making a million.  Here's how we can do it together.

KILOMETERS FOR CARE

100'000 kilometers bicycled, and NOW FOR SALE to benefit charity!

0 km
 
100'000 km
Status: 800 KM sold & CHF 5000.00 donated as of January 4, 2011

Thank you.

My idea is that one-half of your "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" purchase goes to provide  a hot meal and social activities for those needy people welcomed by the staff and volunteers of the Le CARE-Caritas center in Geneva, Switzerland.  The other half of your "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" contribution helps me to keep turning my wheels on my next cycle adventure from Geneva.  Please buy "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" with the PayPal button here. 

 

When scrolling further down this page, you will find two "categories" of visual images.  In one category, you will view scanned pages of each different cycle tour "sponsor book." These "sponsor books" contain highlights of the business cards, brochures and personal comments of those individuals and companies that helped me to realize my daily touring needs with their spontaneous, kind and generous sponsoring.  And then scrolling further on down this page, in a separate category, you will soon find individual annual cycle tour "photo books."  In these tour "photo books" you will see the many faces and places noted in each tour "sponsor book." These two categories are thus complimentary and for your own visual exploration of my cycle travels. Finally scrolling further down, you will then find text listings of my "annual civic encounters" and "annual tour sponsor books."

 

Almost all of my photo book' and sponsor book' category images are referenced, so by quickly identifying a particular person, city, country or company in the internal coppermine program "search" button above, you will immediately be shown a keyword select collection of relevant sorted images compiled from all of the different annual cycle touring presentations combined.  Have a look.  It's simple, easy, revealing and fun.

 

Thank you,
Ron McGerity


 
2011 Tour

Thank you for visiting my web page.  My objective here is to depict my discoveries exploring our world on my bicycle.  My purpose is to show you what a great thrill and a real honor it is to be able to explore so many different  places, cultures and people in a really exciting collection of now more than 50 countries over the last 15 years.

In 1998, I began representing the  Le CARE-Caritas center in Geneva, Switzerland.  My mission was cycling as their rolling ambassador to promote their award winning social  services activities center in Geneva.  Our original fundraising idea, "KILOMETERS FOR CARE,"  enabled my cycling to represent them on long distance pedal pilgrimages to Santiago de Compostela, Rome and even a failed attempt at Jerusalem.

Then in 1999, in a second attempt at reaching Jerusalem, my cycling program grew two-fold to include presenting a civic "Message of Peace" on behalf of the mayor and administrative council of the city of Geneva, Switzerland to the mayor and municipal authorities in Jerusalem.  At the same time, I was also delegated by the Doyen of the Geneva St Pierre Cathedral and his fellow signatory committee of international notables to deliver their "Geneva Spiritual Appeal" to civic authorities, business leaders and global decision makers encountered there.  I was successful with my initiative in Jerusalem and from there began my professional cycling career with a peaceful and spiritual challenge.

In the 2007 celebration of the 30th anniversary of the Le CARE-Caritas center in Geneva I cycled  on a 3 month "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" fundraising tour of Switzerland and Liechtenstein and sold 700 kilometers  Now, back from a 6 month and 11,700 kilometer Geneva-Nordkapp-Geneva tour and with a total of 100,000 kilometers pedalled and for sale, we could contribute 1,0000,00  to Le CARE-Caritas with your active participation in this internet fundraising effort.  That would be amazing, giving away a million while making a million.  Here's how we can do it together.

My idea is that one-half of your "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" purchase goes to provide  a hot meal and social activities for those needy people welcomed by the staff and volunteers of the Le CARE-Caritas center in Geneva, Switzerland.  The other half of your "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" contribution helps me to keep turning my wheels on my next cycle adventure from Geneva.  Please buy "KILOMETERS FOR CARE" with the PayPal button here.

When scrolling further down this page, you will find two "categories" of visual images.  In one category, you will view scanned pages of each different cycle tour "sponsor book." These "sponsor books" contain highlights of the business cards, brochures and personal comments of those individuals and companies that helped me to realize my daily touring needs with their spontaneous, kind and generous sponsoring.  And then scrolling further on down this page, in a separate category, you will soon find individual annual cycle tour "photo books."  In these tour "photo books" you will see the many faces and places noted in each tour "sponsor book." These two categories are thus complimentary and for your own visual exploration of my cycle travels. Finally scrolling further down, you will then find text listings of my "annual civic encounters" and "annual tour sponsor books."

Almost all of my photo book' and sponsor book' category images are referenced, so by quickly identifying a particular person, city, country or company in the internal coppermine program "search" button above, you will immediately be shown a keyword select collection of relevant sorted images compiled from all of the different annual cycle touring presentations combined.  Have a look.  It's simple, easy, revealing and fun.
